label: AB3_tP4_123_a_ce-001
title: CuTi$_{3}$ ($L6_{0}$) Structure
comments: This is a tetragonal distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_cP4_221_a_c-001}{$L1_{2}$ (Cu$_{3}$Au) structure}. When $c = a$ the atoms are at the positions of a face-centered cubic lattice. If we replace the Ti-I atom by Cu, then the system reduces to the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_tP2_123_a_d-001}{$L1_{0}$ (CuAu) structure}. Interestingly, (Massalski, 1986) lists no stable or metastable structures with composition CuTi$_{3}$. (Bystr\"{o}m, 1947) do find a phase of CdAu$_{3}$ which they say has this structure.
